title: Photograph, "Seven stained glass windows", 1904–25
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Windows in the shape of pointed arches. Left, a maiden with two birds on her left arm; "Amor" in a seat below. Above, center, St. Cecilia with musical instrument; below, center, the Virgin with the Christ Child. In the other windows, angels kneeling in medallions, and scenes from the life of Christ.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "Seven stained glass windows", 1904–25. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-25.
